title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for trapezoidal sum

1 point is earned for approximation

1 point is earned for meaning

1 8 ∫ 0 8 E (t)dt≈  1 8 ( 2⋅ E(0)+E(2) 2 +3⋅ E(2)+E(5) 2 +2⋅ E(5)+E(7) 2 +1⋅ E(7)+E(8) 2 ) =10.687 or 10.688 1 8 ∫ 0 8 E(t) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@8F24@

is the average number of hundreds of entries in the box between noon and 8 P.M
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for trapezoidal sum

1 point is earned for approximation

1 point is earned for meaning

1 8 ∫ 0 8 E (t)dt≈  1 8 ( 2⋅ E(0)+E(2) 2 +3⋅ E(2)+E(5) 2 +2⋅ E(5)+E(7) 2 +1⋅ E(7)+E(8) 2 ) =10.687 or 10.688 1 8 ∫ 0 8 E(t) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@8F24@

is the average number of hundreds of entries in the box between noon and 8 P.M

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for trapezoidal sum

1 point is earned for approximation

1 point is earned for meaning

1 8 ∫ 0 8 E (t)dt≈  1 8 ( 2⋅ E(0)+E(2) 2 +3⋅ E(2)+E(5) 2 +2⋅ E(5)+E(7) 2 +1⋅ E(7)+E(8) 2 ) =10.687 or 10.688 1 8 ∫ 0 8 E(t) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@8F24@

is the average number of hundreds of entries in the box between noon and 8 P.M

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for trapezoidal sum

1 point is earned for approximation

1 point is earned for meaning

1 8 ∫ 0 8 E (t)dt≈  1 8 ( 2⋅ E(0)+E(2) 2 +3⋅ E(2)+E(5) 2 +2⋅ E(5)+E(7) 2 +1⋅ E(7)+E(8) 2 ) =10.687 or 10.688 1 8 ∫ 0 8 E(t) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@8F24@

is the average number of hundreds of entries in the box between noon and 8 P.M

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for trapezoidal sum

1 point is earned for approximation

1 point is earned for meaning

is the average number of hundreds of entries in the box between noon and 8 P.M
